title: The Ultimate Pet Project
description:
Sometimes finding what you were born to do takes time -- and a leap of faith. And sometimes it also takes a big bus and a bunch of furry friends. Instagram star Lee Asher’s life went to the dogs. And he couldn’t be happier.

To learn more about The Asher House click here or follow Lee Asher and his pups on Instagram

Promo photo courtesy of Lee Asher

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
